features: L’Oreal Paris Hydra-Renewal is a day and night facial moisturizer that is helps to hydrate dry sensitive skin
Hydra-Renewal Continuous face moisturizer is formulated with Pro-Vitamin B5 to help protect against moisture
Hydra-Renewal Facial moisturizer provides hydration to dry skin and leaves skin softer, healthy looking and radiant
For best results, use this face moisturizer in the morning and night, alone or under makeup, smooth gently onto face and neck until thoroughly absorbed
This face moisturizer is Dermatologist tested for gentleness and is non-comedogenic - does not tend to cause blocked pores
body.description: Product Description This face moisturizer is Dermatologist tested for gentleness and is non-comedogenic - does not tend to cause blocked pores.This new and improved formula provides improved, all-day hydration in a lightweight, fast absorption cream. We continually strive to offer the best formulas to our consumers and this new version is paraben free, mineral oil free and dermatologist tested to be suitable for sensitive skin. For consumers seeking a richer, more nourishing texture, we suggest our Collagen Moisture Filler cream. Brand Story By L'Oreal Paris

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hydra-Renewal Face Moisturizer Unlike some daily face moisturizers, this rich, luxurious hydrating day cream provides abundant levels of moisture from morning to night. Formulated with Pro-Vitamin B5 to help protect against moisture loss and with Moisture Generator, to provide all-day hydration. Provides visible results: Helps prevent moisture lossProvides continuous moisture to dry skinLeaves skin softer, healthy looking and radiant

Ideal Clean Gel Cleanser Eye Defense Eye Cream Hydra-Renewal Face Moisturizer Ideal Clean Makeup Removing Towelettes Skin Benefit Gentle, non-drying facial cleanser. Formula with Pro-Vitamin B5 helps protect against moisture loss. Refreshes and softens in a splash. Eye cream reduces puffiness, lines and dark circles. Light-weight, non-greasy. Dermatologist and Ophthalmologist tested. Pro-Vitamin B5 face moisturizer formula protects against moisture loss. Provides continuous moisture to dry skin. Dermatologist tested for gentleness. Makeup removing towelettes clean and tighten pores without drying out skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am thoroughly impressed! I have been an Olay gal for years. But after moving to a drier climate my skin has been paying the price, and has been so dry nothing works! I tried this product because it had great reviews & Drew Barrymore promoted it as well. So I gave it a try and I LOVE it! Instantly my new favorite. Just after one use my skin no longer felt dry. No flakiness. My makeup went on smoothly. And it feels so good and clean. It does not feel like lotion. No grease. It is like a 2nd skin.And you can't beat it for the price! I would highly recommend!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Face Moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: The Paris Skincare Hydra-Renewal Face Moisturizer is fantastic!It keeps my face hydrated, and the Pro-Vitamin B5 is a game-changer. It's easy to apply, not greasy, and my skin feels so smooth. The packaging is simple and convenient.I've noticed a positive change in my skin since using it. If you need a great face moisturizer, this one is top-notch! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but amazing!
reviews.reviewText: This is moisturizing and thin. Not too heavy on your skin and smells really good too! Perfect for sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is the best I've ever used in my life! I am 80 years old and get compliments on my skin quite often because it just stays soft and moist thanks to this moisturizer. Most cream type moisturizers are almost like putting paste on my skin where this just melts into my skin and truly gives moisture that lasts all day long. I hope they always have this available because it's a product you don't really see much in drug stores and such.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious feel for a good price
reviews.reviewText: Update: 3.27.18 - still going strong. While I have added alpha hydroxy to my skin regime, this is still my base (foundation) cream. I love it. I attached a picture of me in the aqua blue shawl with designs on it from 3.23.18 - taken by moi :-)Update: 11.30.17, I started using this cream at 43 and now I'm 49 and I absolutely still love it. Yes, it may have some chemicals in it (I'm honestly not clear but I bet someone can tell me) but I have tried to find another cream that is reasonably priced and I have yet to find it. I ordered a few creams that cost about $40 each and they did not make my skin look as nice. I like that dewey look and I like a light feel on my skin, the below pics show me with a very light foundation mixed into my cream. I will be ordering this cream until I find another one that's more natural (which may be never ha) AND makes my skin look as nice. Until then? I guess I'm dating a bad boy :-)I've been using this cream for about a year now, I'm 44, and due to an immune disorder, I have Vitiligo, a VERY mild version of it, meaning, I'm still fairly pale but my skin is uneven and my face is darker than it used to be. I used to have peaches and cream skin (Irish, German & Italian heritage) but when I moved to Texas, it seemed like my skin disorder was activated. Anyway, even tho' growing up I wanted darker skin and tanned (I grew up in Long Island), as I got older I really realized the natural beauty of your true skin color. Well, too late ;-( about 12 years after running around Lady Bird Lake here in Austin, I came home and my skin was a yellowish tint. It was almost as if I'd gotten a sunburn but it didn't really go away ;-(I immediately started to exfoliate as much as I could, and did my best to stay out of the sun but long story short, my skin was permanently darkened because my immune system was compromised. So back to this cream, Loreal has always been a good product and reasonably priced but I particularly like this cream because1. It feels very cooling and soft when it goes on2. No filmy feel to it on your skin3. I actually like that it's a little heavy in the sense it can make my skin a little oily looking but I prefer that to dry and cakey looking4. It's cheap!5. It seems to help with my slight discoloration and does NOT add to my yellowish tone that I have acquiredDo NOT get this product if you like your skin very matte or a bit dry - or IF you get this - you'll need foundation/powder - I don't use foundation powder - as much as I struggle with my skin color (mostly I notice it - not too many others) I don't like foundation. I like feeling natural and free with my skin.Overall? This is my favorite day cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very light moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Wasnt heavy .I still had to put another lotion on my face after i applied it.maybe for younger ,oilier skin .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WONDERFUL CLEAN lightly scent, PERFECTION
reviews.reviewText: My skin is very FAIR being a redhead, Fair skin require light moisturizers. This Hydra renewal moisturizer is PERFECTION. The scent is hardly noticeable and pleasant. The gentle cream soaks into my skin and leaves it soft. I have had the product 3 days, and in the Colorado weather which is dry, this is PERFECTION. Not heavy, light, I am 70ish and wish to have something light to work with my schedule, not made-up or heavy creams. For LIGHT SKINNED people this is your CHOICE. FABULOUSLast, I am not sure if this is for those who have deep lines, I do not, given only3 days, if my few smile lines lighten, all the better.I recommend this product for LIGHT SKIN PEOPLE who have taken care of themselves both in eating good food, and limited makeup, no harsh lingering times in the sun. GREAT PRODUCT!! Soaks into my skin and leaves it naturally soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Yo no leí bien y es una crema pero en gel. Aunque la textura es diferente si me agrado mucho como deja mi rostro por las mañanas.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product not meant for Indian Skin
reviews.reviewText: After applying the same. The skin is allergic and large no. pimples can be seen as allergic to the cream. It was then applied to my son's face. Same results. Please avoid this product. Absolute waste of money.
Lo usa mi hija, y lo compré para ella que tiene la piel aún muy joven, producto muy bueno. Hidratante y no graso.
El producto es lo que esperaba, muy bueno
It’s not a cream ! More like a lotion !! I don’t think it’s original
